flawed_nl_solution:
If it takes Moe 10 seconds to eat 40 cuttlebones, then in one second she eats 40 cuttlebones / 10 seconds = <<40/10=4.0>>4.0 cuttlebones/second
Since the cat eats 4.0 pieces of cuttlebone in 1 second, 800 pieces will be 800 cuttlebones / 4.0 cuttlebones/second = <<800/4.0=20.0>>20.0 seconds.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 200.0, not 20.0. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
